entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: ENE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
